# Gizmo Web API – Consolidated Reference

- Base URL: `http://192.168.1.5`
- Auth: Basic (some endpoints) or Bearer token (v2 financial endpoints)
- Token: `GET /api/v2.0/auth/accesstoken?Username=...&Password=...` → use `Authorization: Bearer <TOKEN>`

## LLM Usage Tips
- Prefer v2 endpoints with cursor pagination for large datasets.
- Always pass ISO date-times for DateFrom/DateTo or start/end.
- Follow `result.data` → `result` → `data` when parsing responses.
